ussr.physics
Interface PhysicsEntity

All Known Subinterfaces:
JMEActuator, JMEConnector, JMESensor, PhysicsActuator, PhysicsConnector, PhysicsModuleComponent, PhysicsSensor
All Known Implementing Classes:
JMEBallSocketConnector, JMEBasicConnector, JMEHingeMechanicalConnector, JMELinearActuator, JMEMagneticConnector, JMEMechanicalConnector, JMEModuleComponent, JMEProximitySensor, JMERigidMechanicalConnector, JMERotationalActuator, JMETiltSensor
public interface PhysicsEntity

Abstract interface for any kind of physics entity, allowing physicsal attributes of the entity to be determined

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
